name: Nina
physical_description: Nina's physical form exudes Wyndian royalty. She possesses a lithe, graceful body and a pair of magnificent, feathery wings. Her elegant face is framed by flowing silver hair and sharp, intelligent eyes, and she is often seen in fine, silken robes. She carries a ceremonial sword at her side.
background: The beloved princess of the floating city of Wyndia, Nina was born to a life of duty and political machinations. She is a skilled duelist and a powerful wind mage, but she feels trapped by her royal duties. She joins the party seeking the freedom to forge her own path, but her royal status brings both powerful connections and dangerous political enemies.
voice: A clear, confident mezzo-soprano, but one that occasionally cracks with the strain of her political burdens.
quirk: She unconsciously adjusts her posture to appear more regal, a habit from her royal upbringing.
relationships: Her father, Lord Aerion, is a source of constant conflict due to his strict expectations. Her childhood friend, Captain Faelan, views the party as a chaotic and dangerous influence.
narrative_hook: Nina is burdened by the political machinations of the Ember Concord and her father's strict expectations. She joins the party seeking the freedom to forge her own path, but her royal status brings both powerful connections and dangerous political enemies.

weapon_proficiency.bonus_effect: +1 to Attack Rolls with favored weapon types.
weapon_proficiency.penalty_effect: -2 to Attack Rolls with non-favored weapon types.

playstyles.description: This path focuses on her flight and wind magic, turning her into a nimble skirmisher who can control the battlefield from above.

talents.name: Wind's Favor
talents.effect: As a bonus action, you grant yourself a gust of wind, increasing your movement speed by 15 feet for your current turn.

talents.name: Tempest Blade
talents.effect: A basic, single-target ability that deals 1d10 physical damage and can knock the target back 5 feet.

talents.name: Cutting Gale
talents.effect: As a major action, you launch a blade of wind at a single target, dealing 1d8 physical damage.

talents.name: Updraft
talents.effect: As a bonus action, your jump height and distance are tripled for your turn.

talents.name: Feather Fall (Reaction)
talents.effect: When you or an ally within 30 feet are falling, you can negate the falling damage.

talents.name: Wind-Splitter Shot
talents.effect: When you make a ranged attack, you can channel the wind to add an extra 1d6 physical damage to your attack roll.

talents.name: Aerial Supremacy (Passive)
talents.effect: While in the air, your ranged attacks gain a +1 bonus to their attack roll.

talents.name: Soaring Blade (Modifies Tempest Blade)
talents.effect: Your Tempest Blade's knockback effect increases from 5 feet to 10 feet.

talents.name: Gust of Wind
talents.effect: You can release a strong gust of wind in a 30-foot line. Enemies in the line must make a Might DC 13 check or be pushed back 15 feet.

talents.name: Cyclone
talents.effect: As a major action, you create a 15-foot radius cyclone of howling wind at a point that lasts for 3 rounds. The area is difficult terrain, and all ranged attacks that pass through it have a -2 penalty.

talents.name: Storm Gust (Modifies Wind's Favor)
talents.effect: When you use Wind's Favor, you can now push one adjacent enemy 10 feet away as part of the movement.

talents.name: Wall of Wind
talents.effect: Create a 30-foot long, 10-foot high wall of wind. The wall provides cover and a -4 penalty to ranged attacks that pass through it.

talents.name: Redirecting Winds (Reaction)
talents.effect: When a ranged attack is made against an ally within 30 feet, you can use your Reaction to force a new attack roll with a -2 penalty against a different enemy within 15 feet of the original target.

talents.name: Ride the Wind
talents.effect: For 1 minute, you gain a flying speed of 60 feet and the ability to hover.

talents.name: Tempest Barrage
talents.effect: As a major action, you unleash a flurry of wind-infused sword strikes on a single target, dealing 4d8 physical damage.

talents.name: Perfected Flight (Passive, Modifies Ride the Wind)
talents.effect: Your flight speed from Ride the Wind is increased to 90 feet and you gain a +2 bonus to all Agility checks while flying.

talents.name: Tornado (Ultimate)
talents.effect: As a major action, you summon a swirling tornado that lasts for 3 rounds. As a bonus action on each of your turns, you can move the tornado up to 30 feet. Any creature whose space the tornado enters must make a Might DC 18 check or be picked up, thrown 40 feet in a random direction, and take 5d10 bludgeoning damage. This can only be used once per day.

talents.name: Hurricane (Ultimate)
talents.effect: Summon a 40-foot radius hurricane that lasts for 3 rounds. Enemies are pushed 20 feet from the center, and moving toward the center costs triple movement. This can only be used once per day.

playstyles.description: This path focuses on her leadership and magic for supporting allies.

talents.name: Royal Edict
talents.effect: As a major action, you can issue an inspiring command to an ally within 30 feet. That ally can immediately use their Reaction to move up to 10 feet.

talents.name: Gale Shield
talents.effect: As a major action, you create a shield of wind around an ally, granting them a +2 bonus to their defense for one round.

talents.name: Minor Heal
talents.effect: As a major action, restore 1d8 Vitality to a single ally you can touch.

talents.name: Inspire
talents.effect: As a major action, grant an ally within 30 feet a +2 bonus to their next roll.

talents.name: Tailwind
talents.effect: As a bonus action, grant an ally within 10 feet a gust of wind, increasing their movement speed by 10 feet for their turn.

talents.name: Diplomatic Immunity (Passive)
talents.effect: You have advantage on all Diplomacy checks made to reason with or influence creatures who hold a rank or title (e.g., a city guard, a noble, an officer).

talents.name: Beacon of Hope
talents.effect: As a major action, you project a beacon of reassuring light. All allies within a 15-foot radius regain 1d8 Resolve.

talents.name: Gale Ward (Modifies Gale Shield)
talents.effect: Your Gale Shield now grants a +3 bonus to an ally's defense for one round.

talents.name: Coordinated Maneuver
talents.effect: As a major action, grant one ally an immediate free movement action.

talents.name: Shield of the Zephyr (Reaction)
talents.effect: When you or an ally within 30 feet is hit by an attack, you can create a vortex of wind that reduces the damage taken by 1d10 + your Spirit attribute.

talents.name: Mass Mending
talents.effect: As a major action, you can create a gentle current of air around all allies in a 30-foot radius. All affected allies regain 2d8 Vitality.

talents.name: Rallying Cry
talents.effect: As a major action, you can bolster your allies. All allies who can hear you gain temporary Vitality equal to your Spirit attribute.

talents.name: Inspiring Presence (Modifies Inspire)
talents.effect: When you use Inspire, the bonus increases to +3.

talents.name: Grand Decree
talents.effect: As a major action, you can issue a powerful decree to all allies within 60 feet. For the next 3 rounds, allies gain a +1 bonus to their attack rolls and damage rolls.

talents.name: Sanctuary
talents.effect: As a major action, you create a 20-foot radius sphere of calming wind for 3 rounds. Allies inside are immune to the 'Frightened' condition, and any enemy that enters the area must make a Spirit DC 16 check or lose their will to fight, ending their turn.

talents.name: Aura of Courage (Passive)
talents.effect: You and all allies within 15 feet of you are immune to being 'Frightened'.

talents.name: Perfected Leadership (Ultimate)
talents.effect: As a major action, you tap into your full potential as a leader. For 3 rounds, you and all allies within 60 feet are granted immunity to the Stunned and Frightened status effects, and your attack rolls can no longer have disadvantage. This can only be used once per day.

talents.name: Mass Heal (Ultimate)
talents.effect: As a major action, you channel a powerful restorative wind, healing all allies within 60 feet for 5d10 Vitality and removing all negative status effects. This can only be used once per day.
